page.title: 16 Recreation
page.content: {Children's games-School Playground The games played by children in the school playground rely on very little or inexpensive equipment.Many are variations on the theme of one ettempting to catch everyone else.The remainder are seasonal determined by the weather,skipping and soft tennis in the summer and football in the winter .'Conkers'is autumnal because 'conkers'are the seeds of horsechestnut tree.A hole is bored through the seed it is then threaded onto a piece of string about long.Each player tries to break the opponents 'conker'by hitting it with his own.The conkers are hardened in various ways.Soaking them in vineger and slow baking is one method .Catch games have exciting names such as jailer,British Bull Dog and Rotten Egg,most need no equipment at most a ball.
